Name: Quick Race
About the game: Everything you need to do is very simple – just race and over take every other car on the track to win the race! Quick Race is a simple racing game where you can compete with AI or on a split screen with your friend. Main features included in the game: 10 tracks with different shapes and surfaces ability to change time of the day ability to change AI difficulty different types of cars split screen changeable amount of laps simple steering Quick Race is definitely not the simulation game but the steering is made to imitate as much as possible the real steering. Remember to be a nice driver to the other cars. Otherwise they won’t be nice to you causing you to end a race on a wall or out of the track. So, what are you waiting for? Grab the key and put it into your racer’signition!
